  • Description: The shipment was discovered leaking in a ULD during sort operations. Inner contents: 1 metal can in bubble wrap (OAKITE 31) dented on the bottom chime. All remaining contents were placed in a salvage drum and held for disposition from the shipper.

item.title: Report X-2024120900
item.description:
Report X-2024120900

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-10
  • City: WEST COLUMBIA
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH AND HAD TWO PERISHABLE STICKERS AFFIXED TO THE OUTER BOX. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING PORK SAUSAGE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
